title: I got a skin from Riot.
body: soo. I got nurse akali from riot (like the riot kayle one). no problems but I dont know why I got it. I got it today.

replies.body:
Iiiiiinteresting. From what I can see on my end, Nurse Akali was indeed gifted to you by the system. I'm not sure if maybe EU was holding a special event like the Slumber Parties around 9-22 of last year, but if so it might have been gifted due to the event. 

All in all, I'm honestly not 100% sure why that skin was gifted to you, but it's yours to keep ^_^!
